alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:49PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected with additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Deserts above 4000 feet. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Icy and snow covered roads are likely in the mountain terrain, making travel very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The primary concerns will be along Interstate 40 east of Kingman near Fort Rock, Hualapai Mountain Road, and State Route 66 east of Kingman where snow accumulations will result in dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
